website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable and easy to put on a loveseat.
pros: Two-piece loveseat slipcover fits furniture up to 73" inches wide, up to 34" high and up to 38" deep
Comes in charcoal, chocolate, dark olive, sand, and wine
cons: Tags are sewn on the outside to direct you in placing the covers
It's hard to get them off without damaging the cover

customer_reviews.title: Maybe weak seams, but great fit!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I want to say that I love the fit of this cover. It has been the only one that I have found that will cover all of this couch! But what stinks is that it either came with a rip or somehow ripped when we put it on just now. I will get some needle and thread today to patch it up rather than returning it because of how much I love the fit. I just hope the rest of the seams hold up! Edit- by the next day anoth rip occurred up on the corner. So it does have weak seams and isn't going to last very long unfortunately!
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: So much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: We're using my mother's antique velvet couches until we decide/save up for the ones we really want as she needed a place to store them and it helps us for now. Anyway they have a curved back, winged arms and claw feet and I wasn't sure how nicely a slipcover would work. It covered and tucked in amazingly well! Easy directions, I like the fabric, and am so glad we got a two piece design as it really helps everything stay in place to have the cushions separate. It's not the same as a new couch but I am pretty happy with the results for now. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Megaan J. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great cover and fit.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a few slip covers but none have worked and fit properly like this one has. It's easy to put on, looks great and is durable which is all we can ask for. With some work and safety clips you can make it look totally custom made and tailored but it looks just fine without all the extra hubbub. I'd buy this again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I did all the correct measurements and when I received this, the fabric felt cheap and did not fit correctly at all. The cushion covers fit perfectly, but the larger portion sagged in odd places, while it was taunt in other places. Overall, it appeared cheap and tacky. Additionally, the color on the screen does not really match what you receive. I would not recommend buying this product. In fact, I would rather buy a brand new couch over this.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of browsing different sofa slipcovers, I bought this one because of the reviews and the price. I was worried it wouldn't fit my Lazyboy 90's couch but it fit perfectly. Super easy to put on; in fact, I was able to slip this on with company outside. Took no time at all. I didn't find the tags to be a problem. Came right off and didn't tear. We do have a dog and while she isn't allowed on the furniture her fur does stick to the fabric. Lint brush helps. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli A Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even make it through placement. The portion for covering the base cushions was too small and the piece that covers the couch managed a huge tear in the material. Couch is just under the 96 inch as described by sofa info. Didn't even bother with loveseat since the sofa cover was useless. Returning both unfortunately. The sand color was nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - there is a charge for returning.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color BUT ended up buying a new (smaller) chair that fit our space better so didn’t need the cover after all. I am paying for the privilege of returning it unopened although nowhere in the item description does it state that. I guess Amazon has changed their policy and only items which state “Free Returns” on their product description page are eligible for free returns. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: JSString

customer_reviews.title: Just weird and wrong
customer_reviews.text: After spending quite a bit of time researching sofa covers, I'm really disappointed with this purchase and feel like I wasted precious time. I did not receive 2 pieces as expected--there was supposed to be a separate seat cushion piece which was not included. I also didn't like the the fabric. I had ordered the sand color and it looks more like a small checkerboard with a dark contrasting color creating the checkerboard effect. (So beware if you want something to look like just one color). Also, there was a weird ruffle sewn all around the edges of the cover. Sending this back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: MacsMom

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect for cat households!
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review for this product for the love seat and this applies as well. Looks gorgeous, and the cats have stopped scratching the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Haven

customer_reviews.title: So worth it buy it now
customer_reviews.text: Totally recommend this I was hesitant at first I have a faux leather couch that was given to me and turned it into the dog couch (2 pitbulls and a lab/rott mix) the cushions come completely off the couch so I wanted something to completely cover everything. I've had this for more than 5 years still holding up well and fits the couch perfectly even after the conditions it was subjected to by the dogs. I washed mine in the washer at least once a week for 5 years and dried it in the dryer each time normal settings. I'm still happy with it and it still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: bobbi bauer

customer_reviews.title: Saggy and baggy
customer_reviews.text: Eh.. Not may favorite... I bought the sand color thinking they would be lighter... But it blends in with my carpet.. Not a fan... and k can't return it because it will cost money just to return it.. So I might as well keep it.. I wish there was an option to change the color.. But that didn't work. These are very soft.. So that's nice. But they wrinkle and don't form a nice normal couch look.. I also hate the tags that come in them.. I haven't even removed them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Material seemed cheap and very thin when I unfolded it but I am surprised how well this stays in place on an old leather couch. So far it only requires a "hand smooth" as you walk by. I think it is because the material is amazingly stretchy. It is what it is.."lowest price option" but the couch is no longer painful to look at and the cat really likes it. All the stitching appears to be holding up with no problems and cat hair is easy to remove. I hope it washes well and I will review again if it does not, but so far it is performing flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: jaid

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It looks nice. The loveseat cover does not fit as well as the sofa cover, but still good. The only thing I did not like was the labels on the front that gave placement instructions (arms, back etc.) because they ripped off but not completely and small pieces of them still show. I'm not sure if I pulled a little harder if they would come off, but scared to pull too hard afraid I will rip the fabric of the cover as they are in the seam. Overall, I am happy with my purchase as I am sure most people will not notice the small detail with the seam.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney U.

customer_reviews.title: Color doesn't match, but okay quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a loveseat in olive green. I can confirm the other reviewers saying the colors are all wrong. I got what says is an olive green, but is a light grey. I didn't want to headache of packing it back up and returning it so I just kept it. It fits really well and looks like, plus it is super soft. My dog also found it comfy, and then decided to chew a hole right in the middle of it... I had to sew it up but it is still holding together well. If the coloring was accurate I would have rated this better.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brown

customer_reviews.title: Do not count on this product's quality.
customer_reviews.text: The product came torn. When I opened the package the zipper just fell right out of the box! These shreds of fabric where inside the seat cushion part. I am livid! I needed this to protect my new sofa for the holiday guests. It is pretty and the fabric is soff. That is why I gave it one star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for kids/ pets/ high traffic areas.
customer_reviews.text: The color was exactly what I wanted, the fit was very good as well and the material is soft . My BIGGEST issue that really makes me not want to purchase again is there was a hole along the seen on the love seat cushion which shows that the seams are week , I already have a hole in a brand new product and now am scared to wash them regularly with fear the seams will weaken more - even though the ENTIRE reason I bought these was so I could keep a easy to clean couch
customer_reviews.author: Elloise

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I hate slipcovers. Hate hate HATE. But this one's not bad. It fit my oversized sofa nicely and I really liked that it came with two pieces- one for the "frame" of the sofa and one for the cushions. I feel like for as far as slipcovers go, this one did a good job of fitting snugly and not sliding around too much when someone was sitting on the sofa. But it is a slipcover, and I did put it on a faux leather sofa, so... there was definitely some sliding around. But all in all, if you need a slipcover to extend the life of your sofa, this is an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect cover!
customer_reviews.text: I am embarrassed by just how many different sofa/loveseat covers I have purchased in an effort not to replace my couches. This is the first one I found that fits perfectly! The instructions make it easy to put on and the cover fits tight where it needs to and hangs loose everywhere else. The material is soft and sturdy, even if a little thin. I love these covers and have bought a second set for when they need to go in the wash. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Pixi

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this cover! However, I have 2 dogs and the hair clings to it like no other (I mean, dog hair..right?!). So if you’re looking for a solution to help keep dog hair off the couch, this is not it. With that said, it does stand up to two dogs wrestling on it and using it daily. But it’s a great addition to changing things up! The softness is amazing and the stretch is perfect! Great quality in my book; had it for a couple months now. NOTE: it does shrink a smidge in the wash, so careful not to use to much heat (if any at all).
customer_reviews.author: Kate D.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Had a old couch that was left in my new home when I bought it. It was still in good shape and comfortable, so I got this cover because the original was straight outta the '70's flowers and green! After some struggling to get this put on by myself, it looks great and brought a modern look to an old sofa! I would highly suggest to have two people, it would go much easier and faster. I'm actually looking at this brand for the slip covers for the old wing chairs that were left in the house too.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R. Sears

customer_reviews.title: Fits well. Comfortable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This slipcover actually looks nice. It's very stretchy and fits well. The 2 piece design makes it looks like a normal sofa. I do think the fabric attracts fuzz and dirt - stuff seems to stick to it, bit they do wash up well. They slide out of place with use and I am frequently tucking and stretching them back into place, but i am overall quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to get on, and I was a little nervous when it wasn't fitting 'just right' (my couch is the largest possible size to fit). However, once the cushions were back on, the couch was slid back in place and pillows were thrown on, it was perfect! The fabric is super soft, but seems durable. I have two 80 lbs dogs, and their hair is a little difficult to get out. However they both jump up on the couch, spin and lay down, and there are no holes in the fabric yet! Great quality, and even greater price. Even if this only lasts a year, I'd purchase this cover again.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!! Almost
customer_reviews.text: I love it it fits fine ,great, makes you look like you just bought a new chair so I bought one for my couch, and as for the tags if you pull them gently they will come out, and then get a pair of tweezers and take out the little ones , I believe they were made to come out as you pull on them, so don't worry about the tags. Update: 1/10/18 this is a lint collector I’m thinking of removing it and getting one made with cloth it looked OK at first but not even a sticky roller will remove everything not even a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: SHARKY

customer_reviews.title: A little bit of bunching in the back, but all-in-all, a good find.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a bargain sofa from Big Lots and about a month after I bought it, the cushions started ripping. Not being handy myself with sewing and reupholstering being well outside my area of expertise/comfort zone, I decided to give this a try. It does exactly what I needed it to do as far as the cushions go. I can't get it to fit around the back, however, it kind of bunches a little and can look, not unsightly, but not as clean as the pictures show. Luckily, there are very few people I feel the need to impress, so this doesn't bug me. :)
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Fits on huge couch. Very soft.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lovely leather couch. I also have children. The couch is super comfy but looks horrible. It’s also HUGE. This worked great, better than any other I tried. I only wish it had someway to keep the back from sliding when adorable children repeatedly plop down on it. It has a small tear from having to constantly pull one side back in place.
customer_reviews.author: smblack

customer_reviews.title: My couch looks almost new !
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice product and makes my over-stuffed pottery barn couch that my dog had chewed to shreds, look brand new. If you are installing this yourself on an overstuffed couch get ready for a real struggle it was kind of like putting spanx on a 500 pound person. However the struggle is worth it as it looks almost like fresh upholstering. I am very pleased. I got the chocolate brown and it is a pretty shade that matches the color of the leather on my love seat. Definitely a bargain solution for an ugly couch
customer_reviews.author: eagan1

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but tears at the seams quickly
customer_reviews.text: We were initially very pleased with the Maytex sofa cover. The material seemed sturdy enough and was very stretchy and looked very nice on our sofa. We have discovered that it doesn't hold up to actual use though. The seams are coming apart all over the place fairly quickly. The seams need some reinforcement of some kind I think. The rest of the fabric is fine but once it rips at the seems it serves no purpose. Will not be ordering this cover again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong with these slipcovers! Great price, and the two piece allows for a more secure fit. Soft, stretchy, and very easy to put on. I've had for 8 months and have had to wash them several times due to pets and children. They are holding up great! I HAD mismatching, free, sofas from a family member, now they look perfect together and well within budget. Here's my hack for people who may worry about their sofa cushions due to pets, etc : wrap your cushions in a waterproof mattress protector before sliding into the slipcover...no more cushion cleanup, just toss it all in the wash! It has saved us so much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: AmyB

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It fits better than most slipcovers and is accurately described. Thoughtfully designed and actually has instructions included in the package. The only drawback, as other reviews have stated, is the material is on the thin side. It's pretty but won't last long with heavy use. It could be a great product if only the material were a bit heavier. Despite the material, I would still recommend and probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cover!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I am so impressed with this cover! It fits so well! For the price I am beyond pleased. My microfiber couch gets a lot of use and has picked up a lot of dark spots. I finally reached the stage that scrubbing no longer took them out so this cover was my answer. I had to do some pulling and tucking but check out the picture! Its beautiful, even after sitting on it. I got the sand color and when I first opened the box I thought it would be too dark but nope, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Janine M.

customer_reviews.title: Very thin fabric. It ripped after only two washes.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wine color. It looked like a brand new couch! However, after only two washes, it had huge holes. The fabric is very thin and it picks up lint or pet hair very easily. It was incredibly disappointing to waste money for such a cheap quality product. I do not recommend buying this. If you are looking for a durable couch cover that will last, DO NOT buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: ) Also easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and sand is more of a tan/taupe color which works for me :) Also easy to put on, I love the stretch/softness and blended pattern in the material. Yes when you get up it moves slightly which the best part is, its an easy quick fix/smoothing out which was what I was hoping for buying a 2pc set instead of the annoying one piece covers out there. Not so sure how this would hold up to pets and children, may be a bit to thin for them but easy going adults a happy buy, at least for me. Washing, havent had to yet. Thanks for this deal, I couldnt afford it otherwise. Thank You :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like new!
customer_reviews.text: This couch cover made my couch look like new when I put it on. The fabric feels good & soft, but still durable. Because there is elastic in the material, it was easy to put on and smooth out to perfectly fit my couch. You can push the fabric down between your couch cushion to make it looks as though each cushion has it's own cover. I haven't washed it yet. I hope it will wash well. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ps of Mnd

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material. Rips and snags easily.
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty for first use, but its really thin cheap fabric... so naturally, it tore in multiple spots and snagged and caught holes in several spots. I bought this in two different sizes and they both ripped so it wasn't a matter of bad fit from selecting the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: FL-Gator-Fan

customer_reviews.title: Not for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: Looks decent, a lot of room to adjust. Unfortunately, not durable. I have two dogs and have had it less than a month and there is already a few small holes in the seat of my sofa cover. Would probably be fine for someone without pets. Disappointed I spent this much on a product that doesn't really last. Also purchased the matching love seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: WreckItTech

customer_reviews.title: Soft and stretchy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this couch slip cover on a whim. Being a military family, we know we will be moving in the next year or two so I'm trying to not update our furniture until our next move. Between two little kids and a big, hairy dog our couch has just seen better days. This slip cover fits perfect and it's so soft. I ended up ordering the matching recliner slip cover and as long as the quality is as good as this one, I'll be extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MommyOf2

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 2 pc Olive green cover to go over our couch that is peeling and it is a great cover. I like how the cushions fit into a separate zippered piece. The cover on the arms are a little loose but other than that it is still a great cover. It stays tucked pretty good, even when you sit on it. We have a grand baby that likes to crawl all over it and it still stays in place. I looked for a long time to make sure I was getting a good cover and I can say it was well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: M. L. K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: It's just a little bit snug but still fits. (My couch is a little oversized--102 inches). It's very soft and is perfect for keeping the pet hair off my sofa. It's a two-piece and the seat cushion cover (which gets the most abuse) can be flipped over and used on the other side before laundering. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katydid

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put on and the construction and idea of ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the gray slipcover but ordered this Olive one in hopes that it could pass. That was based on all the other reviews. While it is definitely a grey tone, me and my husband both could still tell it was Olive. It was easy to put on and the construction and idea of it are good but it was still too big for my huge couch. I just felt like there was too much extra material. I eventually took it off and wash it and it's sitting in my closet now.
customer_reviews.author: Randi V.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price.
customer_reviews.text: Need a new couch, have a toddler...enough said. This will work until my children are old enough to not ruin everything we own. The material was stretchy and it was easy enough to put on the couch and it looks much nicer than it did before. It is not super high quality or a nice thick upholstery fabric but for the price to cover an eye sore couch it fits the bill. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Cole

customer_reviews.title: good quality, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The color of the cover is almost identical to the picture, so you will get de desired hue. It is easy to wash. The color did not fade if washed in cold water with mild detergent. It is difficult to get the perfect fit. It’s ‘one size fits most’ of angular sofas. It won’t work well with curvy sofas. Once it is in place, it’s easy to keep clean with a vacuum cleaner or a soft brush. I suggest the use of funiture tacks to keep the back, sides, and bottom in place.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Fits my fat couch!
customer_reviews.text: I just put this on my couch, so I wont be able to rate durability yet, but I'm pleasantly surprised this cover fit my fat fluffy couch! We've tried multiple covers but this one is the only one that fits. It's super soft and looks pretty subtle. Hopefully it holds up against our 100lb bulldog mix. I'll update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Laini Snow

customer_reviews.title: It fits well!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a rather large sofa. 86" L 39" W 25"H which also has the L shaped cushions and huge arm rests. I didn't think that it was going to fit at first, but it stretches really well without stressing or tearing the material. There are tags on it to guide you through your locations and those come off easily without showing a sign that they were there. I am very impressed by the durability overall. I bought the chocolate brown one. I have 4 chihuahuas and so far the dog hair does not seem to be an issue. It brushes away easily with a hand sweep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sharp looking! I was very doubtful and it’s super soft!! I got the beige color. ***update- we have gone through 2 different covers because they rip so easily. They do not hold up to every day wear. Disappointed since we thought the first one was maybe a one time thing. The second slip cover ripped even faster than the first time! I wouldn’t recommend anymore. 2/2/20
customer_reviews.author: liltilley37

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My sofa is this wine color and I didn't want to change the decor in my living room. However, with kids and pets it was hard to keep clean. I decided to buy the slipcover and it fits great! It's soft and has a slightly ridged (corduroy) feel to it. This will be much easier to pull of and machine wash on clold rather than paying for continually professionally cleaning the upholster. So far I like it!
customer_reviews.author: shannon zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great coverup
customer_reviews.text: I really like the cover for my larger couch it fits it great and covers up the existing couch great! I had bought a second one for a bit smaller couch doesn't fit quite as nice as the larger. I would recommend ordering the smallest cover to fit your couch. I am very hopeful on the durability of it, too soon to say. I do love how it comes in two pieces one for the cushions and one for the couch itself. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: K&T

customer_reviews.title: Elastics wear out easily, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product because my cats liked scratching the sides of the couch. Unfortunately the manufacturer put visible tags on the product, and even though I cut them off with scissors small pieces of the tag remained, leaving unsightly pieces of tags in various places. After two weeks the elastic on the bottom sides of the couch wore out, and the cover kept creeping up exposing the bottom portion of the couch. The cover just wouldn't stay on the couch and bunched up. Do not buy this product. I regret spending money on such a worthless product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for that not-often-used room
customer_reviews.text: Got as a cover for the sofa bed in my guest room. Looks great. It's not used every day, so I can't tell you how tight the fit stays or how durable it really is, but the fabric looks and feels great, and the separate covers for the bottom cushions makes it look so much better than regular sofa covers. Also great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GBM

customer_reviews.title: love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product material is soft and covered a patterned couch really well. I have a oversized couch and completely covered it and also purchased on for loveseat. Cover all of the back and front to the floor and my couch has a tall curved back. Material really stretchy. Happy with product. Only complaint is ordered olive and the color is more of a blue/grey. Buy other then that I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Forget buying new furniture
customer_reviews.text: I now own two of these sofa covers, brown and beige. My couch is still in good condition, but I tired of the color. Absolutely love the fit and the easy and quick adjustments that you can make after company leaves. They wash very well and I just pop them in the dryer. For a quick clean up, I use a lint roller. Presto, easy peasy. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K.S. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: very nice. I am so pleased
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Very, very nice. I am so pleased. I have cats that occasionally think the chair or couch is their playground. I've been covering with blankets. Tacky!! The cover is a little to large, but with minor adjustments it looks great! Easy to put on. I am now going to look for covers for my recliners.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Kisman

customer_reviews.title: Very soft slipcover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this slipcover to cover a well built, yet ugly sofa. The pieces were easy to put on. I like that the cushions have a separate piece because if something happens you can wash that cover without taking the whole thing off. I washed the cover according to the directions and when we were putting the cushion cover back on I noticed that the zipper had come apart. I was disappointed that it fell apart after only one washing. Luckily, I was able to re-thread the zipper teeth and zip it up. I have received compliments on the covers. The cover stretches to cover a variety of couch sizes and builds.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Very stretchy and fits well
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this cover. I was skeptical at first because my couch is much older and has "T" cushions at each end. Not a problem at all for this cover! It comes in two pieces....one for the couch and one for the cushions. It was very stretchy and easy to manipulate and tuck in.
customer_reviews.author: W. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit all types of sofa's!
customer_reviews.text: After seeing all the positive reviews, I was excited about these covers. I am SO disappointed. They absolutely do NOT fit all types of couches. My couches have low, fluffy arms.... but not super fluffy! But these covers do not fit the arms at all. If you have thin arms, or arms that meet near the top of the couch you will be fine, but if it doesn't fit that specific type then they will not fit! I am feeling very deceived, and will not be ordering from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: It was a good buy
customer_reviews.text: It is a soft stretchy material but very thin. I purchase the tan color and was true to the pictures. I was shocked it fit as I have a large sofa almost 7ft with removable top cushions.. I did wash it on a delicate cycle and it held up well. Some of the side seems on the arms are a little weak but you get what you pay for. Can't beat $45.00
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: I am mostly satisfied with the sofa and loveseat covers.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the fact that these covers are fairly easy to put on and take off. They are mostly a good fit; however, they were made for furniture with longer legs than mine, so about two inches lays on the floor and spoils the look.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Fits well on my couch and stands up to the paws on it.
customer_reviews.text: It fit nice and snug on my couch. It took a few hours before my 2 dogs were bold enough to get on it, but after that they loved it. It is durable and doesn't show any wear from their paws and claws being on it constantly. It is very soft and comfortable to sit and lay on.
customer_reviews.author: Xan Gallup

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice still months later with animals.
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt even look like a throw over. Have 3 cats and a active dog. Had it for a few months now and still looks great. It does collect noticeable animal hair but i vacuume it off.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn kulhanek

customer_reviews.title: The checkered designs is nice and pleasing and the cream color is very nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Material itself is think. So not sure how long it will last, as there is high risk of it ripping. I suppose this will depend on individual use. But do keep that in mind. But product wise. The checkered designs is nice and pleasing and the cream color is very nice as well. Fit our sofas well.
customer_reviews.author: Nasreen

customer_reviews.title: This couch cover is the best one I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This couch cover is the best one I've ever purchased. My boyfriend owns the most comfortable couch in the world, which is also old, with a pattern that does not match our decor at all. I was worried when buying the tan color that the cover would not be dark enough to cover the pattern on the couch, but it's been fine. It looks almost as if our couch came this way! We followed the washing directions, and it has washed well twice now, with no damage. It is a really soft material as well.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Ok if you do not have kids or animals
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cover on July 10, but probably did not put them on for 2-3 weeks, so now here it is less than 6 months later and they are wearing very thin and have holes in them. Now it should be taken into account that I have 2 dogs, one a large dog that jumped on them several times a day. I think they would last longer and wear better if you have no kids or animals. They are super easy to put on and wash well, but will not stand up to much hard usage. Love the color and design also.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cover is not bad. Purchased to cover old stained couch
customer_reviews.text: Cover is not bad. Purchased to cover old stained couch, hide where cats have torn arms up, and the coushins wouldn't stay put anymore. Would not recommend if you have back cushions that are overstuffed. Looks a little odd. But is super soft!
customer_reviews.author: THERESA

customer_reviews.title: Great for my dogs!
customer_reviews.text: A simple, lightweight, neutral cover for basic needs. Don't expect to impress your mother-in-law, as it is rather flimsy fabric and not very attractive. But for my dogs, it's perfect. I put it over a plastic Furniture Protector on the outside dog couch (under a portal). Everything tucks in nicely. The best part is the separate cushion cover with a zipper. There is a lot of fabric involved, but since it is lightweight, it's easier to wash and hang to dry. DO NOT dry in a really hot dryer.
customer_reviews.author: paulamjames

customer_reviews.title: Everything I've been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Awesome. I love it. This is probably the best thing I've ever bought ever. I have looked high and low and spent way too much money trying to find a damn slipcover that will fit over my once-upon-a-time-before-I-had-a-baby-and-puppy-cream-colored couch that doesn't slip, doesn't need adjusting, is easy to wash, and looks good. This fits all my criteria. So far, I've only had to adjust it once, and that's really because I was cleaning the cushions off and decided to move things around. My couch is an overstuffed/"teddy bear" couch, measuring 72 inches from arm to arm, and (I think) about 92 inches in the back. This fits it perfect! I really could not be happier. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: K. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Brought new life!
customer_reviews.text: Gave my old coaches new life! The coaches I have are in pretty good condition, but the upholstery was out dated. The cover fit great and I think having 2 separate pieces makes it look like there isn't a cover at all. I also think it will make my life easier. I have 2 dogs and a cat, and if I can just wash the cushion cover more often than the enitre cover, it will save me a lot of hassle. I've had them on the couch for only a few minutes, so I will try to write back about durability after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Liz H

customer_reviews.title: I can not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This slipcover did not fit very well and looks very unattractive on my sofa. It shows the material texture through the cover and looks very stretched out. The corners are stretched out much more than shown and I checked the measurements before I ordered. I can not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: averageman

customer_reviews.title: POOR quality!
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for the loveseat and sofa covers I ordered after reading reviews. However, the covers both had small tears in them and were extremely fragile. The white tags left threading/material on the dark colored fabric that cannot be removed. I would have paid half of what I did for this quality. Not worth the money!! The dark carbon is more of a navy blue, FYI.
customer_reviews.author: N. Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how easy it was to put on my sofa. But it helped having 2 of us to put the cushions in the cover. The great part is it stays put and doesn't need adjusting every time you sit on it like the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sally D.

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. I bought the cover for a sofa and loveseat and within 24 hours they had holes and rips. I had recently bought new couches and wanted to protect them from our dogs. This covers were a waste especially for what I paid for them. Complete waste of money. I have never written a bad review for any product so the fact that I am for this says something.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Sartore

customer_reviews.title: My Couch Looks Brand New
customer_reviews.text: My husband inherited his late grandpa's couch from the 80s, it's still in good condition but showing some wear and tear. With 3 kids under the age of 6 the couch gets pretty beat up. I thought I would give this cover a try to try and save the couch because of its sentimental value. The instructions are very easy to follow and it has labels on the cover where that certain part is supposed to go. The material is really nice and what I love the most is it's washable. We had some family come over one time and they thought it was a new couch. I'm glad I found this product!
customer_reviews.author: jchrmed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, soft and stretchy
customer_reviews.text: Update almost two years later in 2018: still perfect! Multiple washes, many many incidents thanks to cats and kids. I'm thinking of getting another set in a different color to change it up, but no need to replace. Worth the money! Perfect fit, soft and stretchy. After moving, I received two beautiful donation couches, perfect shape except 2 different colors. This slip cover is wonderful! Also, we were able to slide a waterproof mattress cover into the seat portion to protect from kids and cats and extend the life! Highly recommend, now just saving up for the matching loveseat.
customer_reviews.author: AmyB

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, but not as sturdy as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy when I got this slipcover because it made my furniture look like new. Having a separate cover for the cushions made it look less like a cover and more like normal furniture. I didn't have any trouble putting in on my furniture. However, I have dogs and cats that like to get on the furniture, and their claws made little holes in the fabric. I sew them up, but I wish the fabric was a little thicker. Also, one of the zippers has broken. I was the covers often, so maybe that is why the zipper broke.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Andros

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure why there are any bad reviews for this
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why there are any bad reviews for this. Not only is the material soft and cuddly, the versatility of the product was surprising. I have two sofas. One us a "large" love seat. 70" long and 30" deep, with removable back pillows and seat cushions. It fit. My other is a standard love seat about 60" long and 12" deep with just removable seat cushions. It fit both of them and looks great. I would recommend the zipper and elastic version just because of it's versatile nature. Made my ugly mismatched couches look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Lichtenberg

customer_reviews.title: Selling used and broken products!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give zero stars! This product is covered in animal hair/dirt and the zipper is broken! I got a used, broken product! Complete waste of money!!! I am livid!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ann

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 4-5 sofa covers, none of them worked. Our dogs sleeps in the sofa and always ends up having half the cover under his but and there are folds and wrinkles everywhere... but this sofa cover is awesome, it does take a little more time to install than any other I've had... but I haven't had to rearrange it once, NOT ONCE since I bought it, like.... 6 months ago? totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ana ceq

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with the look and feel of this slipcover. I received a lot of complements from some family members. Easy to put on and has instructional tags that come off easily. *update The seams aren't sowed together well in the back (The back to my couch is visible) I have 2 holes about 1 inch in diameter along the back seam. I only had it for 1 month ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Does Just Fine
customer_reviews.text: - Easy install - A little loose -- would need tucking/adjusting every 2-3 days if buyer is seeking "perfect fit" look - Fabric is soft (gets warm to nap on) - Durability: Seems good-- it's been 2 mos and is intact (I have dogs) - Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, washable
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very comfortable, washable, material and very easy to set up. Cons: The color is a very dark grey-green not the light sage shown in the image. The couch has small tags sewn onto it which must be removed very carefully. Overall: The material is very thin and stretchy. The kids and pets now all want to lay on the couch. I have not yet washed it to see how that goes. I ordered this piece along with a green quilted pet cover and the colors are nice together.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Cody

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Took my not so pretty couch and turned it into a new one. It fits perfect, doesnt slip around and covers my couch completely. You wouldn't even know it has a cover. Only complaint is it is pretty thin. I am a little worried about washing it, but overall I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade your sofa.
customer_reviews.text: Size was too big. But couldn’t go to love seat since it is a couch. 74” to 96” is too wide a spread. Looks great on. Can’t tell it’s a cover until someone sits on it and it gathers because it’s to big. But as long as it stays on I’m good. Color accurate and softness is great!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Vennette

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time....
customer_reviews.text: Significantly too small for my 94" sofa. Fabric, seams and zipper is of poor quality. The seams tore apart when attempting to zip the bottom cushion cover.
customer_reviews.author: RCH

customer_reviews.title: Quick update to a 15yr old sofa set.
customer_reviews.text: I got it in black. It was way easier than buying a new couch. Looks pretty good and was easy to put on because of the tags they have to help place the fabric in the correct spots. My couch cushions on the back don’t come off so I panicked because I clearly didn’t read before I bought this. Now, Im wondering how it will withstand a wash and my 2 year old?
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: It is one of the most beautiful set to ever fit my sofa and love seat ...
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the most beautiful set to ever fit my sofa and love seat which happens to be bigger than the ordinary size. I bought some different ones before but they always pulled out and it was nothing but trouble trying to tuck them all the time. Maytex Pixel is stress free and gives a complete new different look to the furniture. I love my seats so much and I want to help keep them clean, protected and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: J Njenga

customer_reviews.title: Charged for Returned Item
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a seat cover, received the wrong color. Ordered a second item. Returned the first and was now billed for the returned item again. CHECK YOU BILLING!!! Trying to contact ANYONE is impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Gol4er

customer_reviews.title: Great substitution!
customer_reviews.text: So happy! It took some tucking to get it perfect but I love it. It's pretty soft, almost too warm that if you fell asleep on it, you probably would wake up sweating. It's fine though it seems durable. Also, taking the instruction tags off was really easy. I haven't tried sitting on it for too long but the brown, on the love seat pictured, was the original color I couldn't stand. I also bought pillow covers. Overall I highly recommend. It changes the room so much without buying a new couch.
customer_reviews.author: bolysia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: This actually works really well! I bought because my dog was starting to destroy my couch (and my life) and I wanted it to look nicer. The only issue I have is that it's a little big and has a lot more room than what my couch needs. Which is great if you're not sure your large couch will fit! I'm sure if I wash it in hot water it'll shrink some for me.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: A happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great. I used it on a old sleeper sofa a friend gave me and as a college student you can't be picky. I was a little hesitant about the purchase bc to me it was a bit pricey and I have never seen a couch cover I was a fan of. I am a fan of this cover it ties the room together well. I had some extra room but with proper tucking it was no problem. Most important it stays in place !!!! I am really hoping it last and if it doesnt i will change my review, but as of now I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install, feels soft.
customer_reviews.text: Once we realized there were super easy temporary tags so we knew how to lay the cover out on the couch it became really easy. Went on with two of us in under 5 minutes the first try with no issues. Fit our couch, which has narrow arms and is very long. Color is appealing and product is as advertised. The texture is soft and feels nice on the skin. So far it has held up well to two small dogs and their nails digging into it. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: northofnowhere

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy and soft!
customer_reviews.text: It's almost like a bought a new couch! My husband had a plaid couch since before we got married. The cushions were torn in places and the material wasn't the softest or prettiest to look at. This cover is two parts. One part holds the removable seat cushions and you zip them inside. Then the other part goes over the rest of the couch including the back and armrests. It's super stretchy and loose in some parts, but the material (and color) looks great. Easy to wash, too!
customer_reviews.author: J Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Dusty Olive more of a gray color.
customer_reviews.text: One of the better slip covers I’ve seen. Super easy to put on. You can tell it’s a slip cover, but with the stretch material and tucking everything in, it looks pretty put together. Once I add pillows I’m sure it will help. I decided to listen to the other reviews when it came to the color. This is the “dusty olive” and I figured it would be a dark green/olive green color, but the other reviews mentioned it’s gray. I wanted gray anyways, but didn’t want to pay twice the price for their actual gray color, so I went with the dusty olive, and I have to agree it’s a dark gray.
customer_reviews.author: kmh568

customer_reviews.title: Overall. It works.
customer_reviews.text: Our chair is pretty small - a barrel rocker - but with lots of tucking it works. Have to re-tuck often but overall worth the purchase. The cover has prominent white tags to help with placement but the tags are on the outside so must be removed. if you take it off to wash .... good luck getting it back on!!
customer_reviews.author: nonoyabidnez

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels good.
customer_reviews.text: I paired this couch cover with a different 'sand' chair cover and they're close enough to look good. I like the look and feel of this cover, and it was really easy to put on by myself. This really classed up my living room!
customer_reviews.author: SwamiMami

customer_reviews.title: which is also an awesome service provided by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The color did not match exactly and it appeared to be two-toned. I was also leery about the material. I decided to return it, which is also an awesome service provided by Amazon. Because they gave a month to return it & still receive a full refund there was no rush on my behalf. I then decided to try it just in case and I simply love it. The material enables it to stretch to full capacity and it fits perfectly. It looks like I bought a new loveseat! Once stretched it was just one color! I am about to purchase the three-toned pillows I saw and it will all be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: Quality if OK, however you have to keep tucking in on the sides and readjusting. But I have 2 dogs so that also makes it not stay in place as much. I can say one thing that is great, the cushion's are inside of a full cover that ZIP'S. So you don't have keep adjusting them.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: lacking in quality
customer_reviews.text: This slip cover was a disappointment in regard to quality of the product and the material used. Upon receiving package I attempted to install slip cover on my sofa which looked easy enough to do. When I attempted to use the zipper for the first piece that held the loose cushions of the sofa the zipper immediately came apart. The zipper had plenty of room to function and it was the first time to use it because the product was provided unzipped and neatly folded in sealed plastic. Overall the slipcover looked nice and was a rich shade of brown but quality was not there so I returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lunday

customer_reviews.title: Looked good at first, but won't stay in place for long.
customer_reviews.text: The cushions on my comfy leather sofa were starting to give out and I felt this cover could be a quick fix and forestall the purchase of another couch. Unfortunately, the answer is no, the cover looked great when first put on, but sadly the cover will not stay in place and literally comes off after a few days. The cover seems easy to get dirty as well,but then it can be washed. I will try and devise a way to keep the cover from slipping off, maybe Velcro, we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL

customer_reviews.title: Was okay
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put on. Within a few days lint/crumbs etc easily visible and difficult to remove just with hand swipe. Will need continual cleaning if small children with food around or as in my case an elderly mother.
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: Soft and strechy
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I bought this if it would fit on my couch as I have the attached pillow for the back and tall oversized arms on my couch. This cover is soft and stretchy I love it. Was easy to put on and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: amyb1015

customer_reviews.title: Like a new couch
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It was easy to put on my couch. The two piece system is a great idea: one piece for the cushions and one piece for the rest. This really prevents the bunching and adjusting required of other types of covers. The "stretchiness" of the fabric provides a great clean fit, although it may seem to small at first, with some tugging it does fit good. The fabric is also very soft and makes it a joy to sit on. Plus I like the idea of protecting the original couches fabric. If for some reason this gets ruined over the year, I can just throw it out and buy another cover. Much cheaper than a new couch!
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: The best you could do for a non-custom slipcover!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a very ugly stained couch that my dad wouldn’t let go of. The only option seemed to be a slip cover, however we didn’t have a big budget for anything custom. The olive color is great, however is more of a fusion between a grey and an olive. What’s great about this slip cover is that there is a lot of fabric so you can really tuck in down between the cushions to make it looks not so slip coverish. Not sure if the fabric will stay tucked, so I ordered some pins to keep it in place. Overall I think it’s a great quick fix for any ugly couch!
customer_reviews.author: Emmie

product_meta.title: MAYTEX Pixel Ultra Soft Stretch 2 Piece Arm Furniture Cover, Chocolate Brown Chair Slipcover
product_meta.description: Size:Chair| Color:ChocolateYou'll feel great about choosing the Maytex Pixel 2-Piece Fabric Slipcover when you see how it instantly transforms the look of your favorite chair. You’ll feel even better knowing that you've saved money by extending your chair's life instead of buying new furniture and disposing of the old one in a landfill. The decorative textured mini-dot design on the Pixel slipcover's ultra-soft stretch fabric will refresh your room while the cover protects your chair from food, drinks and pets. Built-in elastic corners ensure that the cover stays in place. The Pixel furniture cover fits standard-shape chairs measuring from 32 to 43 inches wide (outside arm to outside arm), up to 34 inches high and up to 38 inches deep. The machine-washable Pixel furniture protector is available in a variety of sizes and colors to coordinate with your room decor. Installation is easy, with instructional tags to guide you.
feature_bullets: TRANSFORM THE LOOK OF YOUR CHAIR FOR LESS: A new Pixel slipcover instantly refreshes your room décor and saves you from the expense of new furniture; ideal for updating and protecting your furniture for work from home needs
EASY INSTALLATION: Durable yet comfortable slipcover is easy to install, with instructional tags to seamlessly guide you through the installation process
PATENTED SEPARATE SEAT CUSHION: Features a patented 2-piece separate seat cushion for a semi-custom look; compatible with box cushions and t-cushions
SUPERIOR DESIGN AND FIT: Soft, lightweight, stretchable fabric with a textured mini-dot design contours to the shape of your furniture, and built-in elastic corners keep your slipcover in place

FITS STANDARD-SHAPE CHAIRS: Pixel fits standard-shape chairs measuring from 32 to 43 inches wide (outside arm to outside arm), up to 34 inches high and up to 38 inches deep (Please check out our size guides on this page before purchasing to get the best fit. For leather furniture, we recommend using a non-slip underlay to achieve a better fit)
EXTEND THE LIFE OF YOUR FURNITURE: Protects your chair from all that sitting around that you’ve been doing!
MACHINE WASHABLE: Easy to keep your chair clean and looking like new

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars3,259 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
